# Stubborn Mixed

With the Stubborn add on, Eraser cant erase your role, Cleanser can't cleanse you, Bandit can't steal from you and Monarch can't knight you.
Additionally, you cant gain any new addons from the merchant.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Stubborns that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Stubborn
  • Impostors can have Stubborn
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role
  • Crewmates can have Stubborn
    • ON: Crewmates can become this role
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become this role
  • Neutrals can have Stubborn
    • ON: Neutrals can become this role
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become this role

Idea: Dailyhare & Coding: ryuk
